title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - heavy division b78xh - version 0.1.11
description:
In this addon spotlight we will look at the new version of the  B78XH addon which has been recently updated. The good news is that it is now compatible with both Sim Update 6 and 7. In addition to this the team made multiple other changes specifically to the FMC which makes it possible to both import the flight plans created in MSFS 2020 as well as the ones created using SimBrief.

If you like to use the mod use link below to download it:
https://github.com/Heavy-Division/B78XH
